text: When I select a war file to deploy in the "Select WAR file to upload" section, the manager will complain and fail to deploy the war if a war with the same name already exists.  This requires me to undeploy my application first.  The problem is, with a large war file, it can sometimes take several minutes to upload.  I'd like to see the manager simply auto-undeploy an existing webapp when the newly uploaded one is finished and ready to deploy.  This will keep down-time to a bare minimum while the webapp is reloaded.
creator: david@sogeeky.net
